item.title: Paju, Gyeonggi-do, Korea - The shooting location is also awesome! The place where the sad love of first love was loaded, the drama 'She was pretty'
item.description:
The shooting location is also awesome! The place where the sad love of first love was loaded, the drama 'She was pretty'

Paju, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

This fall, a remarkable romantic drama <She was pretty>, who threw away the hearts of women, farewell to viewers. Hyejin, who has been transformed into a “bomb bomber,” and Seong-joon's sweet romance, which is transformed into a “super-climb lottery man,” has also melted their hearts. Let's go find the romance that might meet your first love.
Gangmun beach bench where Seongjun and Hyejin sat together
Where her hand touched him, the Forest of Wisdom
Hyejin (Hwang Jung-eum) and Sung Joon (Park Seo-jun), the heroes of the male and female characters in the drama, do not seem to pass. However, there is a space that suggests their ties through a book found together with time difference.
Entrance to the Forest of Wisdom
Introduced as an in-house library during the play, it often appeared as a meeting place for Sung Jun, boosting viewers' interest. It is the Forest of Wisdom located in Paju Publishing City.
State of visitor reading freely
As soon as you open the door of a low and distinctive building, you seem to have entered a large bookshelf forest. It's about 8m high, and it's about a whirlwind. However, if you walk along the scent of paper that warms your heart, you might find a more attractive library.
A space designed to keep visitors comfortable throughout the day
It is different from other libraries boasting heavy silence. Freedom flows for a mother to read a storybook by her child. If you're going to take a bite, you can also enjoy some light food at the cafe. For those who want to eat a meal properly, one of the three pavilions that make up the Forest of Wisdom has a restaurant called Glow. During the week, we offer a selection of attractive lunch sets at good prices.
Lunch set of restaurant "Glow" which satisfies both taste and price
If you want to spend a lazy one night and two nights with a book, you can use the guest house support. There are three buildings open 24 hours a day, so it's perfect to spend a long night in the sea.
Guest House Jijihyang Lounge
Where he recognized her, Gangmun Beach

Loosen the lone boat anchor and climb on the sperm. I will.

-From Song Kang Jeong-cheol, Kanto Star Song

Gangmun Beach with beautiful structures to take pictures
Song Kang Chungcheol expressed how beautiful he was in the Kwandong Byeonggok with the expression 'Everything's around the Gangneung' Gangmungyo '(currently the bridge) in the 16th century. The indigo sea behind the signboard with this phrase is where Sung Joon began to feel sweet emotions for Hyejin for the first time. Gangmun Beach, located south of Gangmun Bridge, is the beach that filled the hearts of many people like her smiling in the camera frame taken for the magazine photo shoot.
Gangmun beach with beautiful indigo
Located next to Gyeongpo Beach, this place is small and quiet unlike Gyeongpo Beach, so it is the best place to think alone. This place is perfect for `` traveling alone. '' The beautiful structures I saw in the drama are also sparse, so it's good to take a picture with your lover or a friend and leave memories. If you are planning to stay overnight, check out the night Gangmun Beach. The night view of the sodary bridge connecting Gangmun beach and Gyeongpo beach is excellent.
The light changes every moment and the night view of the more beautiful tower
For those who just want to meet Gangmun beach, I recommend a meal at Paul & Mary, a homemade burger house located at the beginning. Beach and homemade burgers. It's a strange combination that can't be imagined, but it's rumored to be already in line.
State of exotic shop
The main menu is the bacon mozzarella burger, where the mozzarella cheese flows like a waterfall. Don't be surprised to see how the modifier, 'visual thug' fits together. Juicy patties, chewy and rich mozzarella cheese, and fresh vegetables combine to create a more fantastic combination.
Typical bacon mozzarella burger
The place where he and her tremble are kept
It was fascinated by the warm lunches prepared for loved ones who work on the weekends and the high-profile of the proposals. It's Dumulhead, a place that viewers choose as the best scene, and the best choice for photo hobbyists.
Dumulmul, formerly called 'head', refers to the area of Yangshu-ri, Yangseo-myeon where the stems of the Namhan River and the Bukhan River meet and merge. Until 1973, Paldang Dam was a people staying in Gangwon-do on the waterway. However, instead of a lane, the boat was blocked, and so did his life as a muzzle.
Fantastic look of Dumulde head
But many still visit here. To see the fantastic scenery you can't find anywhere else. The blue light that meets the sky, Kim Hue-sung, the only shipyard in Korea, and the 400-year-old zelkova tree, which boasts a height of 30m and a circumference of 8m, combine to create a unique and rare landscape. Thanks to this, it is popular not only for drama but also for various shooting places such as movies, advertisements and weddings.
The best place to take pictures on Dumuldeu
At dawn, photographers from all over the country gather to capture the fascinating sunrise of Dumul head. It is hard to express how the water mist that blooms lump together creates a dreamy atmosphere. The inscription on the rock tells us, 'Did you see the water fog that mysteriously rises in the dawn sky?' If you're curious about the wonderful dawn of the water fog, why don't you go on an early date this weekend?
Painter sketching head

item.title: Bucheon, South Korea - 냠냠 Bucheon Center, Children's Food Safety Experience Center, Gyeonggi-do
item.description:
냠냠 Bucheon Center, Children's Food Safety Experience Center, Gyeonggi-do

Bucheon, South Korea

Candy, ramen, soda… . Why do children prefer to be harmful? If you want to change the eating habits of your child who likes sweet and stimulating food, visit the Bucheon Center for Children's Food Safety Experience Center in Gyeonggi-do. As you enjoy the game, you will learn about nutrition, proper eating habits, and food hygiene. One visit won't change your eating habits, but it's enough to create a momentum for you.

냠냠 Bucheon Center, Children's Food Safety Experience Center, Gyeonggi-do
Experience-like Content

냠냠 Gyeonggi-do Children's Food Safety Experience Center (hereinafter referred to as the Food Safety Experience Center) is a place where infants and elementary school children can have fun and learn healthy eating habits. The space is small enough for everyone to experience in one to two hours, but the contents are clear for its size.

Food Safety Experience Center
Open the door and you'll notice a photo zone with a large sandwich bed and cracker table. As you pass the photo zone, a trimman with a long nose, like Pinocchio, looks down at the visitor. It looks like you're sucking on a soda can with a straw, and you can press a button in the middle of the can to trim it. While eating, the air swallowed together flows back into the esophagus. The soda contains a large amount of carbon dioxide, which results in undigested gas. It's easy to feel good at digestion, but it doesn't really help.
Photo zone for commemorative photos lying on a sandwich bed
Behind the trimman, there are several farting chairs that sound ‘Pooh’. Even though it makes a sound without smell, the children hold the nose and sit down and stand and have fun. If you endure farts, they may be absorbed into the blood or pee. However, if you put up with it too long, your stomach will get sore and your stomach will not be able to digest.
The fart sounds are fun.
In the case of individual viewing, visitors can freely tour the facilities in the experience hall. Video viewing and strawberry milk making experiments will be held together with the children. The video, Secrets in the Refrigerator, shows the dangers of spoiled food and the importance of healthy ingredients.
Videos to learn about food hygiene
After watching the video, the experiment of making strawberry milk begins. There are white milk and coloring on the table where children sit together. Add a few drops of pink to white milk, a few drops of strawberry-flavored additives, and sugar to mix the sweet strawberry milk that kids love. Strawberry milk or banana milk does not contain strawberries or bananas, but rather is an experiment that tells you that a lot of food additives and sugar. Almost all processed foods contain various food additives such as pigments, preservatives and coagulants. Food additives can cause allergies, diarrhea and vomiting and increase the risk of scary diseases such as anemia, cancer and hepatitis. Avoid processed foods that contain food additives, such as white milk rather than strawberry or banana milk, and fish rather than crab meat.
Strawberry milk has no strawberries ~
Next to the experiment table is a game called 'Catch the Color Man.' When a lot of coloring ice cream, candy, sweets, etc. appear on the screen, throw a small pocket to play. The children threw their pockets, shouting “Ice cream, don't eat!”, “Candy, go away!”. You can't really know how long you're going to go home, but this time is true.
Throw your pocket and catch the sax man ~
No junk food, no!
The children are busy laughing when they enter the corner of our digestion story. This is because the whole body comes out on the screen and the stomach, small intestine, large intestine, and anal images are shown in the body, showing how the food is digested and taken into the poop. It's fun to squat and take a poop. Next to it is the 'Mysterious Table' where you learn balanced eating habits. Among the foods that appear on the screen, you can select the foods that fit your mission and put them on the plate.
Smart Mart and Bad Mart show children's favorite high-calorie, low-nutrition and junk food. First, the smart mart picks one of the baskets on the display and puts it on a plate. It is a formula that shows the ingredients of foods by taking a lot of foods such as excessive sodium such as cup ramen, high-fat foods such as hamburgers, and processed beverages containing a large amount of food additives. In addition, 'Knowing the amount of salt' in Jajangmyeon, Kalguksu, Naengmyeon, and Ramen etc. .
Smart Mart to inform nutrition
If you look at the junk foods provided in the bad mart on the camera, the coloring man and bacteria man appears to show the problems of each food. You can look for foods that are past their expiration date, have been added with unacceptable pigments, or have been unsanitarily cooked in bad food.
Bad Mart to find bad food
You'll also find Cocomong's healthy gym corner, your exact height and weight, atopy OX quiz game, a microscopic view of the bacteria that cause food poisoning, and a hand-washing experience corner that teaches you how to properly wash your hands. The sneeze nostrils, a space for understanding rhinitis, are especially popular with children because they shoot a small ball into the nostrils.
Wash your hands to make sure you wash well
If you are a child who doesn't like eggplants or mushrooms, make sure to experience the `` wall of overcoming dermatitis. '' Rather than nagging you to eat vegetables and fruits steadily for healthy skin, you'll remember the importance of stepping up the vegetables at this corner. 'Health Avatar' is also a game-type experience. Avatars who follow their gestures choose snacks, and if they choose pizza, burgers, and soda, they get fat, and if they choose vegetables, fruits, or milk, they get stronger.
“Walls for overcoming dermatitis” decorated with artificial rocks
There is a farming experience garden and an animal cage outside. From spring to autumn, you can plant, grow, and harvest 20 kinds of vegetables such as pumpkin, eggplant, paprika, tomatoes, lettuce, and potatoes. In chicken and rabbit farms next to the garden, they may feed or observe movement.
Farming experience garden where you can grow various vegetables
The Cactus Greenhouse and the Climate Change Experience Center in the Resource Circulation Center are opposite the Food Safety Experience Center. In addition to Bucheon-si, Osan-si has a children's food safety experience center.
If you're a weekday, take a look at the climate change

item.title: Pocheon, South Korea - The Miniature African Continent, The Park African Museum
item.description:
The Miniature African Continent, The Park African Museum

Pocheon, South Korea

“Good artists copy, great artists steal.” Picasso's quote is that he calls himself the “king of the arts.” As he said, Cubists, including Matisse and Brac, completed his distinctive expressionist art, inspired by African sculptures. Come see the African art that stole the hearts of genius artists and the continent of inspiration.
Entrance of The Park African Museum
Where the sun is chosen, Africa
Africa, which means “the sun shines well” in Latin, is literally a continent full of passion under the abundant sun. Africa is home to a brilliant civilization. You can see the people living there breathing with nature at The Park African Museum (African Museum).
The African Museum was first opened in 2006 to promote cultural exchanges with African countries. Take a slow stroll through the gardens and face the entrance to the museum, where you can experience African culture.
Sloping Road to the Museum
Before entering the museum, if you are interested in sculptures, look closely at the shows and sculptures surrounding the garden. Showa sculpture, the essence of African stone culture, is a modern sculpture that began to develop around Zimbabwe's sculptural community in the 1950s. It is a highly difficult piece made by hand, using only traditional tools such as chisels and hammers, while maintaining the original shape to instill a spirit into the stone. It is recognized as a work of art so long as there is a saying that 'if there are 10 leading sculptors leading the world, at least five will be Shona sculptures'.
African sculptures decorating the museum
Rediscovering Africa
The African Museum shows you not only the culture and art of Africa but also the lives and lives of Africans. When I enter the museum exhibition room, I am shocked by the soft and rhythmic African melody.
The first-floor art shop, as well as the exhibition hall is full of interesting things
1 In the exhibition room, you can meet about 100 relics related to culture such as patriarchs, native beliefs and hunting, as well as folk music and musical instruments. It seems to be armed with intense clunky, but each one is delicate and mysterious.
1 The entrance of the exhibition hall and the chairs used by the tribal chiefs are cool
In the 2nd Exhibition Hall, where you can have a glimpse into the life and life culture of Africans, you can understand various African rituals that we cannot encounter through life.
The second floor where African native paintings are displayed
For Africans, consciousness is very important because it is an important process to formulate individual change. From birth, he is recognized by his community through rituals at important times such as the ceremony, wedding, funeral, and ritual.
Mystical sculptures found in the craft showroom
If you think that the viewing is over by looking around the exhibition room, it is Osan. There is literally a special meeting in the special exhibition room. Wild animals that have been restored vividly to every hair with their craftsmanship welcome us.
African ornaments that are likely to be fashionable
The popular animals of the World Animal Expedition Expo, which have been conducted over the past two years, have been gathered together and dressed as a theme for each character. As if the tiger in the movie 'Life of Pie' jumps at me, he is proud of the big size, and the polar bear on the glacier smiles with his chubby paws.
Restoration animals to meet in the special exhibition room
Let's relax at the performance hall in front of the museum. A local cultural troupe in Africa, a lively cultural heritage, will perform lively and rhythmic dances along with live music to match traditional percussion instruments such as djembe. African dance is the basis of exciting dances such as mambo, twist, and disco that have been popular all over the world.
Restoration animals to meet in the special exhibition room
If you're really excited, go upstage and shake it together. You can learn African dance properly. After the show, you will be given photo time, which is a good way to leave visible memories. However, because the performance is held twice a day, it is essential to check the time.
Carp pond. Take a stroll and enjoy the autumn mood
After the show, if you can afford it, take a quick stroll through the park. Colorfully colored leaves, we realize that this is Korea, not Africa. Why don't you fall in love with Africa with beautiful promenades during the season of travel?
State of beautifully colored autumn leaves
Travel info

The Park African Museum

item.title: Icheon, South Korea - I live with rice! Restoration in a bowl of “King's King Icheon Rice”
item.description:
I live with rice! Restoration in a bowl of “King's King Icheon Rice”

Icheon, South Korea

Passing through Chobok and entering the center of the heat, now is the season when you need to take care of yourself. At this time, we use summer chicken with eel or chicken. Based on the style of Lee Yeol-chi-yeol introduced earlier, cool cold noodles, plural nights, and red bean shaved ice are added as summer delicacies. It's a hot season full of various styles of food, but no matter what anyone says, Koreans live with 'bapsim'. So prepared. From the old days, the rice paddy town that has caught on to the king's appetite.
Our Korean food divided into stocks and corrosion. Most Asian regions, including South Korea and neighboring China and Japan, are rice cultures that are cooked with rice and side dishes. In Western cultures where bread is eaten, wheat is replaced by rice. We need water to build our staple rice crop. This is why 'irrigation' is needed to water farmland. This required a large number of labor forces and farmers gathered around the waterways to induce community life. This characteristic of the Asian region, which shows cooperation and interdependence, emerges from the stock 'rice farming'. On the other hand, wheat, which grows on bare ground without irrigation, reveals the characteristics of the Western world, which have a strong personal and independent character.
Glutinous Icheon stone rice with rice
How much have you tasted?
My parents say that they eat “white meat with meat soup” only a few times a year. It means that precious. Now that the world is better, rice consumption has decreased as food is overflowing. However, in the 1970s, when mass production of rice became possible, many wished to eat a single rice.
Hancheon at Deokje Palace, a restaurant specializing in Icheon rice
It is a difficult time for us to imagine that lunches and white kimbap with white rice are easily available at convenience stores.
Appetizers served when you order rice meal
Like this, rice is a staple food that we eat three times a day. What is so special about Icheon rice, which is said to have been won by King Surat, among the “rices” everyone eats every day? Icheon rice is growing despite the decrease in rice production nationwide. To taste his charm, headed to Chungchungdae.
Appetizers served when you order rice meal
Gap Street, Icheon Gyeongchung-daero
The road leading to Icheon by way of National Highway No. 3 is followed by restaurants that announce “Icheon Rice Restaurant”. Many famous rice shops, such as Deokje Palace, Icheon Rice Restaurant, and King's Rice Restaurant, are quite popular on weekends and weekdays. When ordered, Icheon rice, which was suggested to the king, is put in a stone-cooker and cooked. Other grains other than rice are white rice. Sometimes black beans enter the house. Like other nutritious rice, the jujube, chestnut, pine nuts, etc. are made only with rice, but the shiny rice itself is sweet and sweet. What side dishes would not be enough to greasy and delicious rice. Precious side dishes are added to this, so it's better to loosen the belt for a while.
How about the sweet rice you eat every day? The rice itself seems to taste the dishes. Asked the owner of Icheon's rice bakery, he chose "large daylight when the sun is abundant and the rice ripens" and "a land rich in nutrients mixed with clay and sand." It would mean that the rice has the optimal natural environment to grow. Since ancient times, this is why rice was chosen as a true beauty. What is important is that Icheon Rice's reputation is not just an old story.
Icheon rice street where Icheon rice specialty shops gather
The wage table Icheon rice, familiar to us, was the first rice in Korea to be attached with the wage table in the mid-1990s. The history of Icheon rice, which was on the top of the king's surat statue, is preserved as it is, and the revolutionary work was made to increase the reputation of Icheon rice.
“With the“ Mika ”boom, the leisure life of our people began in earnest. What's the most important thing to play around? Isn't the Geumgang mountain after dinner? As more and more people went to and from the Seoul metropolitan area, one or two restaurants started to be built on Icheon side. At first, we put our side dishes on rice, and as people gathered and restaurants increased, we now have a huge table. ”
Panoramic view of Deokje Palace built with Hanok style
Sweet or sweet! Greasy, white rice
Let's go try the Icheon rice meal. If you go to a restaurant specializing in Icheon rice, there are two or three set meals. There is a slight price difference, and the cheapest meals are prepared from 10,000 won to 30,000 won.
Icheon rice cooker Icheon stone-cooked rice
There is a slight price difference between restaurants, but no big difference. Appetizers such as porridge, jeon, salad, jelly, and chopped vegetables are similar. There are one or two differences in the main menu such as grilled eel, cutlet stew, gujeolpan, steamed ribs, soy crab, samhab, and smelt sashimi. Still, it is the same that Icheon Dolsot Rice is included in all price ranges.
Hansang
If you have a particular favorite side dish, you can also add a la carte to the cheapest meal. Most restaurants can be ordered from two or more people
Soy crab, one of the main menus
Dolsol rice is tasted according to taste. For those who want to enjoy the rice hot, you can enjoy it while you put it in a stone bowl and enjoy it.
LA ribs
It's only summer left to get hot. If you are tired of the rainy season and the typhoon that blows through the heat, why don't you go for a “bapsim”?
Noodles, the delicacy of stone rice
The energy of the tiger rises in a bowl of warm white rice. Whoever said that, Koreans are living with 'bapsim'.
One croaker rice in white rice
When you're done eating, stop by Sulbong Park, a 15-minute drive away. How about extinguishing while walking through Seolbong Park Lake? You may add cultural life at Woljeon Museum of Art.
Seolbong Park near Icheon Rice Street
Oh, if you know Icheon, the rice district, let's know the rice culture festival that takes place every year. This year, the festival will be held in Seolbong Park for five days from October 21 to 25. Not only rice, but also various attractions such as Namdang Playa and Madang Theater. For some reason, don't forget to eat a bowl of Icheon rice!

item.title: Gunsan, Jeonbuk, Korea - Gunsan Sinsi-do, a place to catch saltwater fish
item.description:
Gunsan Sinsi-do, a place to catch saltwater fish

Gunsan, Jeonbuk, Korea

The place where we could meet 90 minutes by boat from Gunsan Port came to us with a fantastic drive course and superb view. I have met Shinsi-do, a place with beautiful and secluded island scenery and exciting fun.
Experiencers enjoying the opening under the rising sun
Gogunsan-gun is a must-see
The road that has no end, the sea and the vast sea that surrounds it are mysterious. Saemangeum room, where we changed the map of South Korea in April 2010
Lovers enjoying a date at Saemangeum Seawall
zero
Road to Wolyeongjae behind Saemangeum Service Area
In the middle of the embankment is Shinsido, which is designated as the Knoll Island among the four-color autumn themed islands selected by the Ministry of Tourism and the Korea Tourism Organization.
Yellow ribbon to indicate winding
In Sinsido, people began to live in the early days of Silla due to the herring of herring around the island. Gogunsan-gun, with its beautiful scenery called “star in the lake,” is the largest of the 24 islands. I would like to stop for a while and leave a picture if I am running along a cool road along the embankment. That's why it's nice to see a rest area or an observatory. One of the most famous is the Saemangeum Rest Area, which is located at the highest 199 peak (199 m above sea level) in Sinsi-do. Opposite is a monument to the construction of the Saemangeum Seawall.
Monument to build Saemangeum Seawall opposite the Saemangeum Rest Area
It is not so difficult to see the landscape of Gogunsan-gun at the rest area. Behind the parking lot of the rest area, there is a way up to Wolyeongjae which is a 7 course of Gunsan winding road. It is an alley connecting Sinsi-do and the embankment, and it can be said to be the starting point for the realization of Gogunsan-gun. As you climb the slope, you will find a crossroad between 199 and Wolyeongbong. Wolyeongbong is composed of columnar joints that can be enjoyed in Jeju Island.
Superb view of Gogunsan archipelago from 199bong
If you want to capture both the Gogunsan-gun and Saemangeum embankments, head to 199. The hiking trail that climbs to the 199 mountain peak is less intimidating than it might be due to the appearance of the Gogunsan archipelago.
Saemangeum dike seen downhill from the summit
199 peaks so arrived. Gogunsan-gun, facing Haemu, is a masterpiece drawn by nature enough to paralyze the nerves of the whole body. I want to sit down and watch the sunset, but it's hard to come down when it's dark.
Middle-aged couple sitting side by side and looking at Gogunsan-gun
The finishing strokes, opening of Nol Island
When it is said to go in and experience, the people who change their boots to go to the mud flats quickly and easily. This is because it is a perfect moment for you to feel the taste of fish thicker than your forearm. It is the site of the “opening experience”, which is the No. 1 public trust that made the new city a “nole island”.
A child holding her mother's hand and looking over the mud flat
Opening is the traditional fishing way to catch fish. At low tide, the pine pilings are semi-oval on the mud flats, and the bottom of the net is buried along the pilings on the bottom of the mud flats. At high tide, we sailed out of the boat, hung the top of the net on the pine stakes, and spread the net.
State of children enjoying Gaemagi
The expectation that fishing is difficult due to the muddy water is missed nicely. If the water depth gets shallower, the mullet, which is over 50cm long, will appear, but it is more appropriate to say that it is difficult to catch it with great force. Feel for the first time in life
State of children enjoying Gaemagi
Experience is not possible every day, so make a reservation after checking the date by phone or through the website. It's a fishing method using tea, so you can experience it around the corner. Also, don't be late for experience. You should start on time to enjoy longer.
Gray Mullet
The Sinsido Fishing Village offers free boot rental for an easy opening experience. However, the fish scales are slippery, so preparing a paddock is essential. It's a good idea to get extra clothes because you may get wet in the sea or you might fall off a mud flat.
Large amount of fish caught enough to prepare icebox

item.title: Suyeong-gu, Busan, South Korea - Feast of confession hotter than fireworks, Busan Fireworks Festival
item.description:
Feast of confession hotter than fireworks, Busan Fireworks Festival

Suyeong-gu, Busan, South Korea

To leave memories that will last a lifetime, everyone will dream of a trip. There is a festival where you can add your confession to your loved one. Opportunity to communicate the heart with fireworks against the background of moist night sea and sweet music. I want to love you. Let's go to Busan night sea where Busan Fireworks Festival is held every year.
A scene from the Busan Fireworks Festival
Confession of love delivered by fireworks

In October, the Busan Fireworks Festival is held every year. This year, two days from October 23, the theme of `` The beginning of love is confession '' was unchanged, and the city of Busan Gwangalli was brilliantly embroidered. However, we have prepared a much richer composition and various programs than before, and above all, we changed the way of directing the fireworks and greatly expanded the space of the fireworks show.

The fireworks show, the center of the festival, has become more colorful and has made the hearts of the viewers more chewy. First of all, he invited the world's best overseas flame team to be enthralled. In addition, the way the fireworks were produced has not changed much over the past 10 years. Unlike the previous one, which was held for 50 minutes under one theme, it took a 5-minute break after the 15-minute invitational fireworks show, and increased the concentration by directing it to the melody that suits the theme 'The beginning of love is confession' for 35 minutes.

During the five-minute break, special events caught the attention of the people. To commemorate the 50th anniversary of the normalization of Korean-Japanese relations, a fire broke out on the Tsushima Island closest to us beyond the Korea Strait.
The fireworks you see in person are even more impressive.
The stage, which is bigger than ever, was also noticed. This year, Busan Fireworks Festival is the largest in history. Considering that visitors were unable to watch properly due to the concentration of visitors, the stage of the '-' shape, which was spread around Gwangan Bridge, was expanded to the shape of a 'U' band after Dongbaek Island, Gwangalli and Igidae. As a result, the stage production was also changed, so the fireworks were much richer than before.
The fireworks you see in person are even more impressive.
Cultural arts, street performances and eve events are also abundant.
The Busan Fireworks Festival was only one day on the 24th, but on the 23rd, the day before, it was no less enjoyable. The biggest change is the eve concert. Last year's eve concert was held at Gwangalli Beach at 7:00 pm on the 23rd, which had nothing to do with the fireworks festival. Kim Beom-soo, Kim Tae-woo, Park Ji-min, Bernard Park, Son Seung-yeon, Jeong Dong-ha, Ali, and other singers gave me a more powerful stage than the fireworks. After the last night's concert, a 15-minute “overnight fireworks show” was held to inspire the festival.
Citizens enjoying the Busan Fireworks Festival
On the day of the festival, abundant sights were waiting for us. In addition to occupying good seats, young artists performed street performances from 2:00 pm for those who gathered from early times because they missed expectations.
Street performance attracting people's attention
Various events were spread along the Gwangalli Beach such as bands, dancing, percussion, and DJing to enjoy the event until 8 o'clock when the fireworks festival began.
Street performance attracting people's attention
The fireworks festival is over, but there are ways to enjoy the afterglow. The winning work of the Busan Fireworks Festival, which was held to become a festival with citizens, is on display at the Suyeong Riverside Special Exhibition Hall on the 31st under the theme of "Harmony of Light and Softening."
Street performances for both men and women

item.title: Goheung-gun, Jeonnam, Korea - Goheung Sihodo & Neighbor, prehistoric times and the universe
item.description:
Goheung Sihodo & Neighbor, prehistoric times and the universe

Goheung-gun, Jeonnam, Korea

Goheung's first aerospace route from Korea. The street name alone makes my heart flutter. Do you pass through this road to the universe? But there is a special bond found on this road. It's a time machine going back in time. Two minutes by chubby boat, the primitive age welcomes us 200,000 years ago. 40 minutes away, the past and the future coexist like the Naro Space Center.
Okay! Now start to the island with the past and the future!
Take a trip to Shiho Island where you can enjoy the opening and tidal-flat experience
Shiho-do, a place to taste primitive times
No electricity, no water. Primitive outfits also shoot arrows. The tribes also compete for food. Canned shellfish and fish caught in nets are the food that day. Firewood should be lit with a flint behind the pan, but the fish can be grilled. Shihodo is the place where people live away from civilization.
Follow the path to see the tiger boat
One day in Shiho Island begins with the return of cell phones from the Kowloon Village dock on the same side of the island. Shiho-do is named after a tiger dying. When you arrive at the dock and go over the belly material that corresponds to the tiger's belly, the elasticity of ‘와’ comes out. The primitive tents, which can be used by four or five people, create an imagination that seemed to immerse themselves in the popular TV program "Jungle's Law." When your phone rings, you get busy, and you'll be out of date.
Precious wild ganoderma lucidum growing on the roadside
The Seahodo program, where many families and groups work together, begins by creating teams to create tribes.
There is an experience hall located at the end of the downhill road with a total of 8 huts.
It is also unique that all programs are conducted in tribal units, such as electing tribal leaders and creating tribal flags.
A hut in Shiho-do is provided as a lodging facility for two-day, one-night visitors.
Kim Jong-bae, the chief of Shiho-do, said, “Since I am too busy, it is awkward to be with someone and to be considerate. “The reason why Shihodo exists is to help people realize the importance of the family through their primitive tribal experiences and to understand what community life is like.”
Trimming the fish caught. Because it is natural, the taste is excellent.
The program varies depending on the age, purpose and experience of the visitors.
People wearing primitive clothes and experiencing the opening ceremony
But what is included is a survival experience assuming uninhabited distress. Fire with flint and firewood, and the meal itself must be solved.
Group tourists experiencing the opening <Photo courtesy of Shihodo>
Resolving a meal with fish caught from the opening experience and vegetables from local gardens provides a different experience of 'food'.
Fire here and bake fish
There is not only experience. Even if you're in the midst of a humble jungle, you'll be able to walk through pristine forests, stare at the green seas in a superb view, or sit in front of the blazing firewood and count the stars in the starry sky after the darkness falls. The anxiety in the city that was once disappeared.
You also have to go get your own water bottle.
The next morning, I wake up as if I'm dreaming, and somewhere bewildered for a while. At high tide, the raft experience begins. It is a game in which each tribe boards a raft that is smaller than a raft and returns a buoy floating far away from the sea, assuming escape from an uninhabited island.
Even the scenery of Shihodo <Photo courtesy of Shihodo>
In addition, after the big and small experiences such as cardiopulmonary resuscitation training, after the retirement ceremony, it is light and unfortunately steps up to the belly.
Swing hanging on the tree. Popular regardless of age or gender!
This is to visit the Naro Space Center, where you can experience the future 180 degrees different from the prehistoric age.
A Mixed Message From a Child to His Parents
Where the dream for the universe grows
Naroho, Korea's first space launch vehicle, started out as a dream. In addition, the Naro Space Center, the birthplace of Korea's space development, and the Space Science Museum for the young people who will be responsible for the future of space are joining. No one can enter the Narrow Main Center, but the space science museum at the entrance is accessible. The theme of 'universe', which can be difficult to feel, can be easily solved with various experiences and attractions to induce interest.
Entrance to the Narrow Space Center
There are permanent exhibition halls on the first and second floors. When you enter the entrance where the cute characters in space suits greet you, three monitors embodying the universe are welcomed.
Entrance to permanent exhibition
Simple space science such as vacuum, gravity, and atmospheric resistance, which are the basic principles of motion in space, can be encountered through various experimental devices. In particular, the Naro Lake model, which has been reduced to 1/3 of its actual size so that you can actually feel the vibration when it is launched, is the highlight of the first floor exhibition!
Space described about gravity
So who is the intrigue on the second floor? It is the international space station where astronauts reside. It is a centerpiece that attracts the attention of visitors, as it is a realistic representation of the interior of the International Space Station, where astronauts stay and perform missions in space science experiments.
Naro Model scaled down to 1/3 of actual size
In addition, there are many things to see, including a world of zero gravity, body changes in space, and a three-dimensional solar system.
Solar system planet which can see in three dimensions
Not only that. Participation in programs tailored to eye level by age allows you to approach the universe in a variety of ways, not just viewing, but also creating, screening, and teaching. In addition, the 4D Dome Cinema, located on the 2nd floor, offers a variety of space image contents and five senses to create a fun experience.
Restroom inside the International Space Station
After experiencing the inside of the space science museum, you can go out to the outdoors where you can relax tired eyes. Instead of Naro, who has finished his mission in space, a full-scale model of the Naro is imposing in the middle of the rocket plaza. Parabolic surfaces (a curved surface that collects sound and radio waves effectively transmit small sounds or radio waves), and abundant sculptures such as communication, solar cells, and sundials make the eyes pleasant.
Space food sealed in vinyl
Shiho Island and Ounaro, where you can experience the five senses, not just the island with only snow. Why don't you go on an autumn trip to this place full of fun not only for family but also for group trips?

item.title: Nowon-gu, Seoul, Korea - The King of Joseon Dynasty, where 'Naesi' slept, is thrilled even in midsummer! Mount Naesi, Seoul Draft
item.description:
The King of Joseon Dynasty, where 'Naesi' slept, is thrilled even in midsummer! Mount Naesi, Seoul Draft

Nowon-gu, Seoul, Korea

Choansan Mountain (114m) is located in Changdong-dong, Dobong-gu and Wolgye-dong, Nowon-gu. On the surface, it looks like a garden near the house, but when you enter it, there are many paths between the lush bushes. Thanks to this, it is loved as a walking course for the locals. Here, you can see the tombs of four generations and eunuchs in Joseon Dynasty scattered around Choansan Mountain and add “study history”. Introducing the Mt. Naesi, a creepy mountain of Mt.

Mun In-seok and Sang-seok of Chosun Myeons
How did the eunuchs live?
Before we enter the draft, let's take a look at the lives of today's heroes 'Naesi'. Give it up. A castrated king's man who appears in movies or dramas with the king. In Joseon's palace, the king's woman, “My List” and the king's man, “Nasibu” existed.
Choansan Tomb of the Joseon Dynasty
There are quite a few stories about “my name book” in which the king's concubines and court ladies belong to. In contrast, there aren't many stories about endopsies. 'Naesibu', the dictionary, is introduced as 'a government office in charge of meals in the royal court of the Joseon Dynasty and the delivery of the royal name.' All staff were appointed by officials, and the chief crest of the inner city was the second merchant vessel, which served as the king's meal and attendant secretary. The second piece is the fourth product line in the Joseon Dynasty. It shows a different power from the image that was evoked. Of course, it may be a bit lower than the “Women's women” who were able to go up to the first item, but the “men of the kings” who stayed close to the king's closest side also enjoyed a lot of power.
Fallen Headstones and Superiors
140 seats in the inner city. They were the only male archers who were in charge of housekeeping, including the food and cleaning of the palace, and the royal family, including the king and queen. They were castrated and could not play a male role. Nevertheless, those who came to power as "men of the king" marryed and adopted their families. Various unpleasant events led to the appeal of subordinates against the marriage of the eunuchs, but thanks to the royal court, the eunuchs also enjoyed a "marriage life."
It is a common scene in Chosun-gun tomb of Choan-san.
Abandoned Mysteries
A good time too. The grave where the eunuchs are asleep is terrible. It is incredibly ugly to believe that one day they lived without a blemish at the side of the king.
From Wolgye-dong to the summit of Choan-san
Maybe it wasn't a 'real blood line'. Sleeping without a descendant to take care of the eunuchseongungun is not managed at all.
Promenade leading to the summit at the Choanshan Changgol District
A stone monument, a mangstone, a cut-throat copper magnet, and a Moon-seok stoned by the abandoned tomb are lonesome.
The bush is lush and you can take a cool walk in the middle of summer.
Chosunsan Joseon Dynasty's Tomb Myeon (No.440) is a starting point for Wolgye High School in Nowon-gu, Wolgye-dong.
Sperm to rest near the summit
The address is San 8-3, Wolgye-dong, Nowon-gu, Seoul. If you look at the Joseon Dynasty cemetery exhibited in Biseokgol Neighborhood Park, which is located on the playground of Wolgye High School, you will be able to have a more substantial “History of Joansan History”.
Summit Heliport
The expedition of Choonsan Joseon Dynasty's excursion began at Biseokgol Neighborhood Park.
In the Seokgol Valley neighborhood park, stones near Choonsan Joseon Dynasty's tombs are gathered. Mun-seok, Mang-seok, Bronze, Sang-seok, and Tombstones dressed in bokbok and brass clothing are displayed as they are. Mangjuseok, which plays a role in recognizing the tomb from a distance, refers to a pillar of stone standing in front of the tomb. In addition, the small magnet with a cute stature with a small stature is enshrined for those who have excellent academic achievements but who have not climbed the ground or who are the owners of the grave below.
Biseokgol Neighborhood Park located on the playground of Wolgye High School
Moon Seok, who guards the tombs, has changed in shape, size, and form according to the times. In Choansan where Joseon Dynasty was located, you can see Moon Seok Seok dressed in bokdu and brass robes. First abdominal hunger. Bokdu is the coffin used by the former Joseon Dynasty's past disciples when they received a red card. The brass vest means the robe of the Munmu White, which was worn in the ordinances and the auspicious things of a hat decorated with gold. Comparing the two quickly reveals the difference. It is enough to prepare for a visit to Choansan Tomb Myeon if you look for the “stone” made of wide stones and the “stone monument” made to praise the deceased and pass it on to future generations.
The left side is hungry stomach, the right side is brass suit
As you enter Choansan Mountain at the Seokgol Valley Neighborhood Park, you will be greeted by copper magnets with cut necks. Walk back with a sign indicating 1.1km to the summit.
Copper magnet smaller than Moon Seok
On the road, as well as the side of the road, left untouched, Moon-seok and Mang-seok are connected. There are many things that can't be recognized. The tomb, apparently abandoned, is also visible. Even though he dies, his loyalty to the palace leads him to the unknown.
A monument to honor the statues of the elders and those who slept.
Is that so? The summer day when the heat wave was released, but the Chosun-gun Joseon Dynasty's grave is shady. It is not a high mountain, but the bush is thick and the sun does not leak. Is it because of the feeling that it suddenly creeps through the abandoned graves? When you get to the top, you breathe in thanks to people who enjoy aerobics to the exciting music. Soon after the helipad, the sperm of the summit of Choansan will come out. Squeeze your neck for a while at the simple top without a cover.
Draft Sanan, a popular walk for locals
From the summit, you can go down to Nokcheon Station, Choansan Changgol District, or Wolgye High School. Choansan (산 安 山), which means `` determine a comfortable resting place, '' is as soft and quiet as its name. It may be because of this that the cemetery which transcended status was established in Joseon Dynasty which was a strict status society.
Broken and neglected stone statue
The villagers held a ritual to appease the eunuchs here every fall, even during the Japanese colonial rule. Since 2013, he has been hosting the 'Duansan Cultural Festival' in Nowon-gu, Seoul to appease the eunuch and the spirits.

item.title: Yangju, Gyeonggi-do, Korea - Enhance Art Sense by Following with Kwon Yul, Yangju Art Museum
item.description:
Enhance Art Sense by Following with Kwon Yul, Yangju Art Museum

Yangju, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

During the boom of mica, Yangju Ilyoung Amusement Park, Jangheung Amusement Park, and Songchu Amusement Park were named to the 4050 households as the Capital Region Drive Course. There are restaurants around the valley with football courts, so it was a good place for family outings. Now all are fading, but as much as Jangheung Amusement Park enters the famous art galleries, which makes the weekend drive fun.
Love by Kang Young-min installed at the beginning of Jangheung Art Park
Outing course in conjunction with art museums, cultural monuments and observatory
Route 39, which connects Deoyang-gu, Goyang-si, and Suseong-dong, Uijeongbu-si, is called Pyeong-ro-ro. This road leads to Jangheung police box and meets a fork called Kwon Yul-ro. Kwon Yul-ro, named after General Kwon-yul, ends at the intersection of Jangheung Art Park, Jangheung Sculpture Park, Yangju City Jang Ukjin Art Museum (hereinafter referred to as Jang Ukjin Art Museum), Horsehead Pass, Ahn Sang-cheol Art Museum and Kisan Reservoir, and at the intersection of Yangju Culture and Arts Center.
In front of Jang Ukjin Museum
Kwon Yul General is located just past the entrance of Jang Ukjin Museum of Art. General Kwon Yul is one of the masters who saved the country during the Imjin War. The dish towel that led to victory is considered to be the Three Great Battalion, along with the Pearl Battling and the Hansan Island Battling. While passing through Kwon Yul-ro, his head is bowed to the general spirit and national ideology of the general. As such, the trip to the Yangju Museum of Art is a trip with cultural heritage. If you include the Songam Space Center, it is a good study outing course that combines astronomical studies. Awaken the sense of art through art museum visits, creating a sense of empathy between parents and children, and enriching stories. So going out to three art galleries in Kwon Yul-ro is not a simple drive.
Dome Theater at Songam Space Center
Jangheung Art Park
Departing from Gupabal, Gisan Reservoir is the final destination and Jangheung Art Park is the first art space to meet at Kwon Yul-ro. It has been bent since it was renamed several times since its establishment. Total Art Museum was first established in 1984, but in 2005, it changed to Jangheung Art Park due to management problems. Later in 2006, Japanese designer and architect Shigeru Uchida designed Art Park and structural designer Van Shigeru designed the venue. In May of that year, an exhibition hall, atelier, performance hall, art gallery, sculpture park, and children's experience center were completed.
Bourdel's Sculpture <Fruit>
Jangheung Art Park is not an art museum dedicated to painting with a certain distance. It is a playground-friendly art space that touches works and displays works that children can ride on. The name of this garden is Bourdel Garden. Sculptures by the sculptor Bourdel, such as Fruits, a Crouching Sacred Woman and Roman Mother and Child, expressing the love of mother and child, welcome visitors from all over the lawn. French sculptor Bourdel is one of the three greatest masters of modern sculpture, along with Rodin and Mayol.
Bourdel's Sculpture <Our Lady with Offerings>
Picasso Children's Art Museum
The Picasso Children's Art Museum is a must-see for adults. Although it is a replica, you can see the works and passionate lives of Picasso's soul (1881 ~ 1973) here. In particular, Picasso's photographs taken by photographer Andre Viller (1930 ~) are incredible, so they are more inspiring. The two first met in 1953. Since then, Biller has photographed many scenes, including Picasso's focus on his work and his thoughts. Picasso's passion in black and white photography and his desire for artistic life come alive.
Mark Quinn's Sculpture <Myth>
Picasso's 11 portraits and family photos also catch the eye. In addition, you can appreciate Picasso's pottery, prints, drawings, and silver plates. Looking back before leaving the museum, Dad takes off his hat and climbs up a ladder in shorts to depict the naked woman's body in a straight line. The viewer's chest is refreshing.
Picasso working in the studio
In addition, Ryu In's Express Train-The Era of Times, Kim Taek Ki's Dream of Peace, Mark Quinn's Myth, and Kang Young Min's Love are the representative sculptures of Jangheung Art Park.
Sculpture by Artist Ryu In <Express Train-The Era of Times>
Jang Ukjin Museum of Art
Just a little up from Jangheung Art Park towards Kwon Yul General Cemetery, Yangju Museum of Art is displayed. The museum was designed after Jang Uk-jin's tiger painting and was opened in April 2014 and won the Kim Soo-geun Architecture Award that year. It is a great pride to have a large collection of genuine artists. More than 230 pieces of murals, oil paintings, prints, ink paintings, etc. are donated by the Jang Uk-Jin Art and Culture Foundation to display them by theme and period.
Yangju Museum of Art
Painter Jang Uk-jin (1917 ~ 1990) is a master of Western painting that represents Korean modern art along with Park Soo-geun and Lee Joong-seop. Born in Yeong-gun, Chungcheongnam-do (now Sejong Special Self-Governing City), the story of his art museum entering Yangju was due to his studio in Deokso, once a land of Yangju County. Since then, he has continued his creative activities in the studios of Seoul Myeongryon-dong, Chungju Suanbo and Yongin Singal.
Visitors to <Animal Family> at Jang Ukjin Museum of Art
<Animal Family> and <Dining Table> painted on cement wall
Admission is good to start from the second floor. In this way, you can meet the master's work first and reflect on his life once again in the first floor video room. <Animal Family> on the second floor is a work that is loved by visitors. Created in 1964, the work description attached to the side tells the old story with black and white photography. Animal Family was painted on the wall of the studio in Deokso, Gyeonggi-do. The warm gaze of the painter can be felt in the artwork where cows, chickens, pigs and dogs are harmoniously drawn like a family. In particular, the real cowcoats and warangs are hung on the murals to evoke local sentiments.
Jang Ukjin Museum of Art
The work that peeled off the painted wall is in the middle of the stairs connecting the basement and the first floor. The title is <Table>. Let's look at the description of the work. “The paintings show the modern life of an artist, and on the screen are forks and knives, spoons and rice bowls, coffee cups, water glasses, flounder and bones. After the painter completed this picture, 'he became. Today, let's replace one meal with this meal. '
Mother and daughter resting in front of the cafe on the 1st floor of Jang Ukjin Museum of Art
The idea of using the gray cement wall as a canvas, and the simplicity and warmth of the canvas. Visitors find love for people and objects in each of their works, develop their imagination, and find themselves more generous. The beauty of a trip to a museum is this.
Jangheung Sculpture Park in front of Jang Ukjin Museum of Art
Ahn Sang-cheol Museum of Art Brings Kisan Reservoir to the Garden
The trip to the museum following Kwon Yul-ro of Yangju-si ends at the An Sang-cheol Museum of Art, located next to Gisan Reservoir. Ahn Sang-cheol (1927-1993) is a painter who left many famous works in the field of oriental painting. He was a professor at Seorabol Art College and Sungshin Women's University. Ahn Sang-cheol, who became a national war star after winning the Minister of Education, Vice President's Award, and President's Award in 1959, married Na Hee-kyun, a contemporary student of Seoul National University and nephew of Na Hye-seok.
Kisan Reservoir from Ansangcheol Museum of Art
At the entrance of the museum, you can follow Ahn's life and enter the exhibition space to see his works. It is a series of work titled <(靈)>, which has colored the old tree. He created this work with the thought that 'the spirit is a body that remains and is passed on by someone even when it dies.'
Ahnsangcheol Museum of Art from the Lawn
The line of spectators continues in front of her works. Although he is an old man with 12 solo exhibitions, he is still actively engaged in creative activities. The copper line is a lawn, which leads to the Kisan Reservoir. The building of the museum is the work of Ahn Woo-sung, the son of Ahn Sang-cheol and the owner of Ongodang Architects. There is a studio with a glass window behind one flower garden. This is where Na Hee-kyun, a painter, sometimes stops to paint. The Ahn Sang-cheol Museum of Art will open until July 15.
Artist Lee Hee-kyun's work <My Mirina 2>

item.title: Tongyeong, Gyeongnam, Korea - Tongyeong, how far have you been? Tongyeong Sasa delicacy to taste 365 days a year
item.description:
Tongyeong, how far have you been? Tongyeong Sasa delicacy to taste 365 days a year

Tongyeong, Gyeongnam, Korea

Tongyeong is full of various foods such as flounder soup in spring, eel in summer, and oyster and water catfish when cold wind starts to blow. As well as the nickname of “Naples of the East,” there is plenty to see and eat in abundant coastal villages. Among them, we have collected the seasonal delicacies of Tongyeong that can be tasted in Tongyeong all the time, regardless of the season. Good news that you can enjoy without worrying even in a light pocket!
Chungmu Gimbap, the delicacy that represents Tongyeong
Separate rice, side dish, light and firm Chungmu Gimbap
Chungmu Gimbap, one of Tongyeong's representative delicacies, became known to the public in the early 1980s when Tongyeong was still 'Chungmu'. Usually gimbap is spread out after adding rice to the side dish and eat it. Chungmu gimbap is served as rice and side dish as a side dish.
Chungmu Gimbap with a little taste difference from house to house
Unlike regular gimbap, which contains various ingredients such as ham, eggs, tuna, and cheese, the side dish is simple with stir-fried radish kimchi, squid and fish paste. If you roll white rice at a good size and add side dishes and soup, it is not enough for a meal.
Squid stir-fry and radish kimchi
There are some 'theories' in the birth of Chungmu Gimbap. One is that my wife, who had packed Kimbab with her husband's lunch box, began to eat rice and side dishes when Kimbab was constantly hurting. The other is that Chungmu Gimbap, which has separate rice and side dishes, was created to make gimbap that does not hurt many people around Tongyeong Passenger Terminal. Gimbap evolved to be less affected by the warm southern weather.
Chungmu Gimbap for Lunch
However, the first Chungmu Gimbap was a little different from what it is now. Jukumina cuttlefish, mussels and radish kimchi were put on bamboo skewers and wrapped in gimbap and paper. Many people were looking for a delicious and easy to eat. The rice is the same, but the current side dish of Chungmu Gimbap can be eaten with skewers. The ingredients were replaced by squid and fish paste, which are easily available instead of Juku or cuttlefish.
Chungmu Gimbap for Lunch
Thanks to this, those who visited Tongyeong taste Chungmu Gimbap. Chungmu Gimbap restaurants are gathered around Seoho Market and Gangguan, opposite the Tongyeong Passenger Ship Terminal, where ships depart for the jewel-like island of Tongyeong. There are many famous three major Halmae Gimbap (055-649-2336), Hanil Gimbap (055-645-2647), Fatty Hal Mae Gimbap (055-645-2619), and Weathered Gimbap (055-644-1990). Most packages are available for 2 people. 4,000 ~ 4500 won per person.
West Lake Market, opposite the Tongyeong Passenger Ship Terminal
Awesome broth for lovers, Zolbok and Sirak soup
If you are a liquor or gourmet, you might have heard of it in the wind. Haejangguk, the first place of Tongyeong's main parties, is the solbok country. It literally cleans up the scallop guts, 'little blowfish', and adds buttercups, bean sprouts, and radish to boil cleanly. It is famous for its cool broth, which blows away any excessive drinking. The cold breeze is in season, but thanks to the improved technology, it can be tasted as a Tongyeong special. Don't forget to add a drop of vinegar when you eat Zhubok Guk. Presses the blowfish's toxicity.
Zolbokguk, made with simmered kimono and added radish and buttercups
Branch restaurants located near Seoho Market (055-644-1990), Crystal Restaurant (055-644-0396), Chronic Reconstruction (055-645-2140), and Dabok Restaurant (055-645-8202) are famous. 9000 Won line Bokmaeuntang costs 10,000 won. In these restaurants, you can enjoy seasonal cuisine, as well as seasonal Dodari mugwort soup, Sambangi spicy soup, and water catfish soup.
Trimmed Rubbish Enters the Rubbish Country
Sirakguk is a must-eat in Tongyeong. Although it feels more commoner than Zolbokkuk, it is 'Two Great Mountains of Tongyeong Soup'.
Sarakguk with miso and broth
Shirakguk, a dialect of Shiraegituk, is a haejangguk made from boiled eel heads and bones sold at the market with orphan siraegi.
Munge Bibimbap served together in Zolbok Guk restaurant
Many aid stores in the West Lake market (055-646-5973) are well known. 5,000 won per person.
Precious Stone Crab on the Namdo Coast and Jeju Island
Tongyeong's representative snack, honey bread
Tongyeong's representative Jujeonburi Honeybread boasts 'national reputation.' As the name suggests, fry the flour, add red bean paste and add sweet syrup to the outside. Sweet honey bread, similar in size to eggs, can be tasted throughout Tongyeong as a national ward.
Honey bread that can be tasted all over Tongyeong
It's also fun to taste a variety of honey breads containing sweet potatoes, chestnuts, citron and green tea.
Honey bread that can be tasted all over Tongyeong
Dozens of honey bakeries are located along Gangguan, including Omisa Honey Bread (055-646-3230), which is known to be the origin of Tongyeong Honey Bread, and Yi Sun Shin Honey Bread (055-644-2255) and Myeongga Honey Bread (055-642-4537). Prices vary little by little, but on average, it costs about 1,000 won.
Honey bread with bean paste
A little unfamiliar name, 'teotgegi' refers to thin slices of raw or boiled sweet potatoes and dried in the sun. When sweet potatoes are dried, the moisture evaporates and the sweet potatoes are twisted. This is called `` pecking '' in Gyeongsang-do. When rice was precious, he ate hunger by eating porridge with dried sweet potatoes. It is 'tteokgi porridge'. Born to be a 21st-century “well-being snack” overflowing with food, it is loved as a sweet snack for those who found Tongyeong. In the vicinity of Gangguan, you can taste it at Honey Complex (055-649-0032) and Tongyeong Uji and Porridge (055-645-7909). Vacuum-packed porridge can be heated at home.
Honey bread seasoned with various beef such as sweet potatoes and chestnuts
If it's funny It's short for 'udon and jjajang', and it's a Tongyeong delicacy eaten with jjajang sauce. When we were thinking about 'jjajang or champon', 'the people in Tongyeong seemed to think' udon or jjajang '. 'Uzzamyeon', born between Udon and Jjajang, is added with jjajang, red pepper powder, and pickled radish. Depot may also be used to make plain broth.
Udon with Udon and Jjajang
It is hard to see it as a great delicacy in this age that is overflowing with food, but it is still warm food with old memories for Tongyeong people. A bowl of 4,000 yuan. There are many Seoho-dong Hallujaja (055-644-9867) and Hangnam-dong Hangnam Wooja (055-646-6547).
Udon with Udon and Jjajang

item.title: Jecheon, Chungbuk, South Korea - One-Day Trip to the Jecheon Scenic Tour Village, a City of Natural Healing
item.description:
One-Day Trip to the Jecheon Scenic Tour Village, a City of Natural Healing

Jecheon, Chungbuk, South Korea

Tourism Tour is a new type of community-led tourism management community project where local residents become owners and voluntarily run tourism projects to create jobs and profits. In 2013, five areas including Yangpyeong, Gyeonggi-do, Yang-gu, Gangwon-do, Jecheon, Chungbuk, Cheongsong, and Jeonbuk, Buan were selected for the pilot project and supported by the Ministry of Culture, Tourism and Sports. Of these five, we will visit the “Tourism Village” in Jecheon, Chungbuk, which is actively operated due to the characteristics of the region.
The Jecheon Sightseeing Tour Village Tour Course consists of three tour village projects and a program that combines tourist attractions located nearby. In order to transform Jecheon's hidden treasures, Gyodong folk painting villages and republic villages into tourist destinations, the “Own Culture and Arts Cooperative” was launched. The Folk Painting Institute in Minhwa Village has developed a variety of murals, experiences, and souvenirs based on folk paintings. The former school, Gongjeon School, offers a variety of enzyme experiences and enzyme meals that are responsible for family health. 'History of History', which is not used at present, is being revived as a 'woodtrain' woodcarving workshop.
Wood Train Remodeled
Gyodong Folk Painting Village, where we meet beautiful and humorous folk paintings through murals
Gyo-dong, where Gyo-dong Folk Painting Village is located, was a dwelling complex in the form of urban and rural complexes since the 1960s, when Korea's industrialization began.However, empty houses have begun to increase in recent years. From the beginning of drawing folk paintings, it is transformed into a folk painting village.
Jangseung Mural in Gyodong Folk Painting Village
Most of the single-storey houses have folk paintings such as tigers and deer, as well as innocent children, who have begun to decorate the walls of Kyodong.
Dragonfly and flower mural
The mural of Kyodong Folk Painting Village is different from the murals of other regions, and the theme of the mural is ‘어변성룡’.
Tiger mural
This word, which means “fish turns into a dragon,” symbolizes passing or success, so I think it's a good place for parents with children.
Fantastic harmony of flowers and murals

Jieun-soon Minhwa Research Institute, which serves as the starting point for Gyodong Folk Painting Village, runs various experience-based event programs, such as drawing folk paintings, making “Eomseong Sungryong” lucky bags using folk paintings, and making folk painting fan. In addition, you can listen to various stories related to folk paintings, and drawing folk paintings using traditional paints provides fun memories for both children and adults.

Eun-Soon Ji Minhwa Debt

In Gyodong Folk Village there is Gyodong Hyanggyo. Gyodong Hyanggyo was established in the year of King Gongyang, the last king of Goryeo, and was designated as Local Tangible Cultural Property 105. It is also a demonstration yangkyo designated by miners of cultural gymnasium.

Abyssal Dragon Lucky Bag
Public electronic junior high school, a place to experience and learn about nature

The “Own Art and Culture Cooperative” is a kind of collaboration made by 15 artists from Jecheon. Other majors, such as literature, photography, ceramics, woodwork, and art, are being utilized and the ones that are lacking are working together to prepare a foundation for independence in various fields such as culture, tourism and hands-on education.

The closed school 'Gongjeon Elementary School' and the closed area 'Gongjeon Station' have been refurbished to operate the 'Gongjeon Elementary School' centered on enzymes, and the 'Woodtrain' where you can experience woodworking with cypress wood. 'Gong-jeon Institute' is famous for various enzyme experiences such as Omija, Ogapi fruit plum, and herbal medicine, and natural enzyme dishes with side dishes.
GongYeon School Cafe
'Gongjeon Junior High School' is located in Gongjeon Elementary School, Gongjeon-ri, Bongyang-eup, Jecheon-si. Gongjeon Elementary School, once a large school with more than 2,000 students, was closed in 1999 due to the agricultural phenomenon.
Public electronics school signs
In recognition of this, Ahn Myung-sook has been rented from Jecheon Office of Education and Support since 2013, and has opened a new door to the “Public Electron School”.
Herbal tea tasting
One of the most popular programs of the public engineering school is the enzyme making experience using seasonal fruits.
Apple enzyme making
Green apples grown organically on the farm are used to make enzymes. Four apples are cut into 18 pieces, seeded well, put in a gourd, put sugar on top and mixed together for a long time. Mix until the sugar has melted and mixed in the apple juice. After tossing it, put it in a glass jar and pour sugar back to the top to cover the apples.
Completed Apple Enzyme
The real attraction here is the natural enzyme meal table. We carefully prepare freshly grown vegetables and enzyme natural meal using enzyme. More than a dozen side dishes add boiled pork. The most important part of a natural enzyme meal is that it comes with a colander of organic vegetables grown by hand. The clear insect streaks on the leaves of the vegetables are proof that they are organic, free of pesticides.
Enzyme side dish
The rice is not mixed with white rice, but with brown rice, chew more than 30 times, and the sweetness comes out on its own. Like all natural enzymes, the salinity of all side dishes is low. So you eat more side dishes than rice. Flour brown rice with organic rice and a spoonful of organic ssamjang with a spoonful of honey.
Grain rice
Wood-Train Wood Works, where you can make everything you need for everyday life

In 'Gongjeon Station', there is a 'Wood Train' run by Kim Kwang-ki. It is a space that produces and displays props that can be used in real life such as props, toys, name initials, pencil holders, etc.

Woodtrain Signs

The café displays a variety of woodwork and jigsaw art pieces that can be used in real life. The most eye-catching is a portrait of a former president made of jigsaw craft on a birch drawing board, hanging over the main entrance of the station. The outdoor carpentry experience room has a space where up to 50 people can experience woodworking. The representative experience program is to make pencil case and letter case using cypress. Pencil cases and letterboxes made from sandpaper, nailed, and carpentry glued to the sticky parts of the cypress cut into various shapes are popular experience programs that preschool children can complete in an hour.

Woodtrain Cafe Exhibit
The station was opened in 1959 and was used by more than 100,000 passengers per year by the end of the 1970s. However, since late 2008, there were no vehicles left without passengers. However, in 2012, Kwang-gi Kim, a woodworking artist, rented history from the Korean Railroad and was reborn as a woodcraft experience space called 'Woodtrain'. The station waiting room, the space where people waited to come and go, was made into a cafe space where you can experience woodworking and drink tea.
Presidential Jigsaw Craft
There are many things to see around the station. Yoo In-seok, a teacher of Sungjae Yoo-jung, raised a medical school to save his country and saved the country. There is Jinso Cheon Railway, famous for the filming of the starring Mint Candy. Woodtrain recently aired as a filming location for its popular program, "1 Night and 2 Days."
Cypress pencil case made by participants of the experience program

item.title: Blossoming ponds and natural forest outings, Jeju Sunchulban Pond and Dongbaekdongsan Forest Trail
item.description:
Blossoming ponds and natural forest outings, Jeju Sunchulban Pond and Dongbaekdongsan Forest Trail

Jeju, South Korea

This is a mountain road leading to the entrance of Sunhul Village. At first glance a bunch of flowers passes by. I just missed it and pulled over. On a small pond adjacent to the road, there are plenty of water lilies. The water lilies are just beginning to bloom and open up their pink petals. The late spring is sent off with a simple yet bright smile.
Secret pond full of blooming flowers
Sunhul Village is located in the middle mountainous area of northeast Jeju. There is a small and small pond where only acquaintances visit. This is a village pond called Seonbanban Pond. If you don't pay attention to it, it's easy to pass by.
Small and small Sunhull Pond, located on the street
In late spring, when the early heat begins to come in, the Sunbahn Pond is filled with water lilies. It begins to bloom one by one in early May, and by mid-day, the pond is colored pink. Blooming petals among green round leaves remind us of pure and pure children.
A bunch of water lily flowers blooming over the pond
The water lily flower that rises above the dark blue water resembles the lotus that blooms in the mud. Resistant to the environment they are in, each one is like a beautiful flower, and the appearance is similar. If the water lily and lotus are a bit confusing, look closely at the leaf shape. Water lilies have flat leaves attached to the surface of water, and one side is deeply split, while lotus flowers have rounded leaves floating on the surface, as if an umbrella was opened. Dropping water on a lotus leaf rolls around without infiltrating or getting wet.
Another water lily that looks like a lotus
The water lily flower that blooms in the sun-dried pond in Jeju's soil is hard to see. Thanks to this, Sunbahn Pond never stops.
I bridge across the pond
People who hold the camera to capture the water lily flowers and those who go out in the late spring outing will take a rest while enjoying the water lily flowers. Cross the bridge across the pond and take a souvenir picture, or slowly stroll around the pond to enjoy a relaxing afternoon. Seon-Ban-Bang-Mok, with its secluded surroundings, is a good place to visit even for travelers who visit Jeju.
Sunbahn Pond Scenery
Camellia Garden designated as Ramsar Wetland
On the other side of the line, there is a forest named Camellia Garden because many camellia trees grow. The forest was once the home of the people. Camellia oil was obtained from the forest and the trees were felled and charcoal burned. Through this, children were raised and villages were built. The forest that gave generously what he had. The Camellia Garden, which was a living place for the residents, was designated as Ramsar Wetland in 2011 and is now being taken care of by people.
Dongbaekdongsan Forest Trail Entrance
Ramsar wetlands are the designation and protection of wetlands that are worth preserving globally through international agreements. In Jeju, four sites were registered as Ramsar Wetland, Sunli-dong Dongbaekdong, Aqua Youngorim, Water Park Orion, and Hill 1100. The village of Sunhull 1-ri, where Dongbaek Garden is located, has earned a meaningful title as 'The Ramsar Village' for the first time in the world in 2013, thanks to the efforts of residents to keep their forests together.
Camellia Garden
Dongbaekdongsan Forest Trail is gentle and flat, making it easy for children to walk. You can start from the Dongbaekdongsan Visitor Information Center across the Seonchulban Pond and go out to the west exit where Sunchulbun Bridge is located or back to the Wetland Center. The entire trail is about 5km long, and you can take a short walk in 2-3 hours.
Forest path full of green
Camellia Garden Forest Walk in Blue May
Once you enter the forest path, you will instantly enter another world. Forests with green leaves tender young leaves wherever they come into contact with snow, and lush branches of leaves can hide even the sky. Birds sitting on branches twitter with clear sounds, and faintly roaring bells are heard from beyond the forest.
Gotjawal, the mystical nature of Jeju
Every time you step, the leaves are crushed. May in Dongbaekdongsan is a mix of autumn and spring. The young buds are pouting their faces through the thick leaves on the floor. If you turn your eyes up, it soon changes to the season of lush greenery. The mystery of Jeju created by Gotjawal's unique natural environment unfolds before your eyes.
4.3 Bottle Cave with the Pain of Events
The Dongbaek Garden is also a historic place that embraces the pain of the residents. The dotle cave, which was found not long after, was a hideout for the residents who fled the tombs at the time of the 4.3 incident. Although you can't go inside the cave now, you can guess the desperate situation by looking at the entrance over the wire mesh. How many days have you been hiding in a narrow cave? It is a heavy step to turn to the sad heart.
Tree Roots Exposed to the Ground
As we crawled through the thick roots of trees that crawled over the ground and wandered through the natural forest where trees and vines intertwined, we quickly reached the wetland. This is where Ramsar Marsh is designated. Distant water moss, which has been accumulated for a long time in the pit rock lava rock, is a rare wetland that is hard to find in Jeju. The sound of birds coming in from time to time in silence and silence is like a gift from nature. I go on my way back with a calm mind.
Distant mower wetland designated as Ramsar Wetlands
After the exploration of the Dongbaekdongsan Mountain, the boats can be filled at the local restaurant 'Dormuk' at the entrance of the village.
Local restaurant “Doormug” located at the entrance of Sunhul Village
Pork stir-fry and buckwheat pancake are neatly served.
Neatly set meal
